ModMetaData.name: [COG] Corvus Surgery UI
ModMetaData.author: PlatoArete
ModMetaData.description:
The ultimate surgery management interface for RimWorld! Features a revolutionary 3-tab system: Overview for comprehensive surgery lists, Visual Planner with interactive body diagrams, and Presets for saved surgery templates.
KEY FEATURES: • Interactive SVG Body Diagram - Click body parts for instant surgery options • Advanced Filtering - Availability states, categories, mods, body parts • Smart Queue Management - Drag/drop reordering, bulk operations, auto-suspension • Surgery Presets - Save and load common surgery combinations • Enhanced Information - Detailed requirements, implant warnings, mod sources • Force Queue System - Queue unavailable surgeries that auto-enable when ready • Full Mod Compatibility - Works with any surgery-adding mod
Press 'O' to open the planner instantly! Streamline your medical operations with the most advanced surgery interface on the Rim.
